title: New potatoes with beans and olives

default: 75g/2¾ oz black olives, pits removed, chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the oil and butter in a frying pan and fry the potato quarters until they turn golden-brown.
Add the green beans to the pan and cook for 4-5 minutes, until the beans are tender.
Stir in the olives and salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve as a side dish.
